amendment.description: An amendment numbered 6 printed in Part B of House Report 118-272 to provide the Health Workforce Account with an additional $10 million for the Nurse Corps programs which is offset with a $19 million deduction to the National Institute of Nursing Research.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Meuser amendment (A005) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Meuser amendment (A005) Agreed to by voice vote.
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Meuser amendment (A005) Agreed to by voice vote.
